description:
The Bigscreen Beyond 2 is a virtual reality headset manufactured by Bigscreen. It was announced in March 2025. It will be the company's 2nd VR headset release.
- This headset is unreleased.
- This headset requires a connection to a PC in order to be used.
- This headset has a high per-eye resolution. 2560x2560
- This headset requires external base stations for full tracking capability.
- This headset is sold without controllers.
Bigscreen Beyond 2 is Bigscreen's second ultra-lightweight PC-powered VR headset release. It features an extremely small form factor and a roughly 20% weight reduction from the original Bigscreen Beyond.

faq.question: When will Bigscreen Beyond 2 be released?
faq.answer: Bigscreen Beyond 2 will be released on June 1st, 2025.

faq.question: How much will Bigscreen Beyond 2 cost?
faq.answer: The price for Bigscreen Beyond 2 will be $1019. This does not include any controllers.

faq.question: What is the resolution of Bigscreen Beyond 2?
faq.answer: Bigscreen Beyond 2 has a resolution of 2560x2560 per-eye, totalling approximately 6.55 million pixels per-eye, or 13.11 million pixels overall.

faq.question: What is the FoV of Bigscreen Beyond 2?
faq.answer: Bigscreen Beyond 2 will have an estimated horizontal field of view of 100 degrees. The vertical field of view of Bigscreen Beyond 2 is estimated to be 91 degrees. Additionally, the headset will have an estimated diagonal field of view of 116 degrees.

faq.question: Will Bigscreen Beyond 2 have hand tracking?
faq.answer: Bigscreen Beyond 2 does not support hand tracking.

faq.question: Will Bigscreen Beyond 2 have eye tracking?
faq.answer: Bigscreen Beyond 2 does not support eye tracking.
